name: Foil Baked Chicken Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Foil Baked Chicken Recipe: Whole chicken 1 Lemon juice 4tbsp Chili sauce 4tbsp Black pepper 1tsp All spice 1tsp Nutmeg ½ tsp Mace ½ tsp Salt ½ tsp Red chili powder 2tsp Oregano as required Garlic paste as required Oil 2to3 tbsp
instructions: Marinate chicken with all ingredients overnight. Now wrap it in foil and cook in double boiler for 1 hour. Lastly bake it in oven for 10 min the serve .
